cheatsheet.title: Creation of a Dual Column Chart and Listing Report

intro.description: This tutorial helps you create a dual column chart and listing report using BIRT.

item.title: Create a Data Source
item.description:
- In Data Explorer view, right-click Data Sources and choose New Data Source. New Data Source displays Classic Models Inc. Sample Database as the selected data source.
- Choose Next.
- Choose Finish.

item.title: Create a Data Set
item.description:
- In Data Explorer view, right-click Data Sets and choose New Data Set.
- On New Data Set, Choose Next.
- On Query, in Available Items, expand one or more tables in the ClassicModels database.
- To create a SQL query, drag column names from Available Items to the right pane to write the SELECT and FROM clauses, then choose Finish.

item.title: Bind the data to the list
item.description:
Select the list element in the layout editor.
In the Property Editor view:
- Choose the Binding tab.
- Select the data set that you want to bind to the list.
- Set data set parameter values if the data set contains parameters.

item.title: Edit the list group
item.description:
- Select the list element then right-click and choose Edit Group->NewListGroup1.
- On Edit Group, specify the group details.

item.title: Edit the left table
item.description:
- Double-click the left table element in the layout editor.
- Drag the fields you need from the Data Explorer view to the left table.

item.title: Edit the right table
item.description:
- Double-click the right table element in the layout editor.
- Drag the fields you need from the Data Explorer view to the right table.

item.title: Edit the charts
item.description: Double-click each of the charts to edit its properties.
